body:
### Xenopus 2012 Workshop - Supplementary information
This is a companion page for the workshop given at the [14th International Xenopus Conference](http://www.xenopus2012.org). It contains the presentations as well as all the links and resources mentioned in the workshop. 

### Presentations
* *Xenopus functional genomics*: data availability and visualization ([odp](http://github.com/simonvh/xenopus2012/raw/master/odp/20120911_workshop_part1.odp)|[pdf](http://github.com/simonvh/xenopus2012/raw/master/pdf/20120911_workshop_part1.pdf))
* *Xenopus functional genomics*: computational analysis of  ChIP-seq data ([odp](http://github.com/simonvh/xenopus2012/raw/master/odp/20120911_workshop_part2.odp)|[pdf](http://github.com/simonvh/xenopus2012/raw/master/pdf/20120911_workshop_part2.pdf))

### TBP peak calling example
* [TBP ChiP-seq data](http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/geo/query/acc.cgi?acc=GSE21482) NCBI GEO GSE21482
* [TBP Wiggle track](http://131.174.221.43/gertjanveenstra/FTP/prom/TBP.wig.gz) Copy link and add as custom track to Genome Browser (either UCSC or NIMR mirror)
* [Galaxy](https://main.g2.bx.psu.edu/) https://main.g2.bx.psu.edu/

### H3K4me3 and H3K27me3 heatmap/profile example
* [H3K4me3/H3K27me3 ChiP-seq data](http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/geo/query/acc.cgi?acc=GSE14025) NCBI GEO GSE14025
* [Xtev genes](http://131.174.221.43/gertjanveenstra/FTP/tracks4.1/Xtev_v1_xenTro2.bed.gz) Xtev gene model version 1.0 (xenTro2/JGI 4.1)
* [seqMINER](http://sourceforge.net/projects/seqminer/) Download seqMINER

### Veenstra lab data
* [Epigenome profile browser](http://131.174.221.43/gertjanveenstra/geneprofile.htm)
* [Data and genome browser tracks](http://131.174.221.43/gertjanveenstra/genomedata.asp)
* [GEO accessions](http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/gds?term=veenstra%20AND%20xenopus%20%5BORGN%5D)

### Tools
* [UCSC Genome Browser](http://genome.ucsc.edu/)
* [NIMR-MRC Mirror](http://genomes.nimr.mrc.ac.uk/) UCSC Genome Browser mirror for JGI 7.1 genome (Mike Gilchrist)
* [seqMINER](http://bips.u-strasbg.fr/seqminer/tiki-index.php)

### Resources and tutorials
* [BED/Wiggle specification](http://genome.ucsc.edu/FAQ/FAQformat.html) 
* [BAM/SAM specification](http://samtools.sourceforge.net/SAM1.pdf)
* [OpenHelix Genome Browser tutorial](http://www.openhelix.com/ucsc)
* [Galaxy screencasts and demos](http://wiki.g2.bx.psu.edu/Learn/Screencasts)

### References
* [The epigenome in early vertebrate development](http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/22139962)
    Bogdanović O, van Heeringen SJ, Veenstra GJ.
    Genesis. 2012 Mar;50(3):192-206.
    PMID: 22139962
* [Temporal uncoupling of the DNA methylome and transcriptional repression during embryogenesis.](http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/21636662)
    Bogdanovic O, Long SW, van Heeringen SJ, Brinkman AB, Gómez-Skarmeta JL, Stunnenberg HG, Jones PL, Veenstra GJ.
    Genome Res. 2011 Aug;21(8):1313-27.
    PMID: 21636662 
* [Nucleotide composition-linked divergence of vertebrate core promoter architecture.](http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/21284373)
    van Heeringen SJ, Akhtar W, Jacobi UG, Akkers RC, Suzuki Y, Veenstra GJ.
    Genome Res. 2011 Mar;21(3):410-21.
    PMID: 21284373 
* [A hierarchy of H3K4me3 and H3K27me3 acquisition in spatial gene regulation in Xenopus embryos](http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/19758566)
    Akkers RC, van Heeringen SJ, Jacobi UG, Janssen-Megens EM, Françoijs KJ, Stunnenberg HG, Veenstra GJ.
    Dev Cell. 2009 Sep;17(3):425-34.
    PMID: 19758566

### Contact
For questions contact Simon van Heeringen (s.vanheeringen@ncmls.ru.nl).
